subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Wyoming Coach Joe Glenn apologized yesterday for making an obscene gesture to Utah players on Saturday in Salt Lake City after the Utes tried an onside kick while ahead by 43 points in a 50-0 victory.“Football is an emotional game, and I let my emotions get the best of me,” Glenn said in a statement.Glenn was reprimanded by the Mountain West Conference.
